name: Zombies Ate My Neighbors: Ultimate Edition
overview: A complete level hack of the classic game with 55 new levels in total. In Zombies Ate My Neighbors, the player takes the role of a male or female protagonist (Zeke or Julia), fighting vampires, mummies, zombies, and other horrifying creatures. The goal is to destroy these monsters, survive the all new 50+ levels (not including secret ones), and rescue the neighbors that have survived the onslaught. There is a defined number of neighbors who can be saved on every level. When they are all rescued, an "Exit" door opens, and the player advances to the next level.
